mapper.sql: id, user_name, sex, password, telphone, avatar, type, positional_titles, case_example, status, create_time
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, user_name, sex, password, telphone, avatar, type, positional_titles, case_example, status, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{positionalTitles,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{caseExample,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into user
id,
user_name,
sex,
password,
telphone,
avatar,
type,
positional_titles,
case_example,
status,
create_time,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{positionalTitles,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{caseExample,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update user
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telphone = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR},
positional_titles = #{positionalTitles,jdbcType=CHAR},
case_example = #{caseExample,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telphone = #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, positional_titles = #{positionalTitles,jdbcType=CHAR}, case_example = #{caseExample,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) FROM user WHERE telphone = #{telphone}

SELECT u.id designerId, u.user_name designerName, u.telphone telphone, u.sex sex, d.service_address serviceAddress, d.introduce introduce, d.record record, d.positional_title positionalTitle, d.engage_time engageTime, d.design_amount_low designAmountLow, d.design_amount_high designAmountHigh FROM designer d, user u WHERE u.id = d.user_id AND d.status = '0' ORDER BY u.create_time

SELECT u.user_name designerName, u.telphone telphone, u.sex sex, d.service_address serviceAddress, d.introduce introduce, d.record record, d.positional_title positionalTitle, d.engage_time engageTime, d.design_amount_low designAmountLow, d.design_amount_high designAmountHigh FROM designer d, user u WHERE u.id = d.user_id AND d.status = '0' AND u.id = #{user_id}
